oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Use of corticosteroids alone or combined with glucose to treat ketosis in dairy cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shpigel, N. Y.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: treatments
ketosis
therapeutic success
relative efficacy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Relative efficacy of 4 treatments for ketosis in cows and factors affecting therapeutic success were evaluated in a clinical trial. Full article published in Journal American Veterinary Medical Association (1996); 208, 1702-1704
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 28
